resources.string: "Please fill all required fields and fix any errors on the form before saving"
"This item is locked and can only be displayed."
"To continue, correct all the errors first."
"Your changes may be lost if you proceed. Would you like to save these changes?"
"Cannot replace receipt when device is offline. Please try again later."

"IMPORTANT: In the upcoming months, we will be deprecating iOS devices on OS lower than 8.0. Users will be able to continue using Concur Mobile 9.26.1. Concur for iOS version 9.27 will require iOS 8.0 or higher."
"Please select a destination for your receipt."
"iPadHome: There was an error accessing your Salesforce account. Please go to Concur web to grant access."
"What would you like to book today?"
"You can change and delete any items in the list before you choose \'Upload All\'"
"Your Approval of this Expense Claim is only for those items tied to your cost object. The Expense Claim may contain other cost object items requiring additional approval."
"There is an additional %1$s fee for this round trip."
"Please note there is a %1$s before your next flight which departs at %2$s and arrives at %3$s"
"This is an out-of-policy flight and must be booked on the Web."
"To calculate your travel allowances, we need you to create an itinerary with all the stops."
"To calculate your travel allowances, we need you to choose from the itineraries below or create a new one."
"To claim travel allowance, add an itinerary."
"Due to offline mode, an itinerary was created and erroneous segments were discarded."
"as of today, %1$@ . %2$@ out of the %3$@ budget has been spent."
"multiple fares are available for this flight"
"Please note that there is a %1$@ in %2$@ before your next flight."
"Ensure that the Departure Date is before the Arrival Date."
"Overlap with preceding trip segment is not allowed. Please correct your entries."
"Overlap with following trip segment is not allowed. Please correct your entries."
"Border crossing time must be after departure and before arrival time."
"Do you want to add an itinerary now, so that we can calculate your travel allowances?"
"Itinerary %s will now be removed from your expense claim."
"Itinerary %s will now be removed from your expense claim."
"Itinerary %@ will now be removed from your expense claim."
"Adjust the dates and times or add another trip segment to claim allowances."
"Something went wrong. Try again, or enter the distance manually instead."
"Automatic calculation is not possible without entering locations. Enter the distance manually."
"We couldn\'t find %@. Make sure your search is spelled correctly."
"We couldn\'t find %s. Make sure your search is spelled correctly."
"The distance from %1$@ to %2$@ couldn\'t be calculated."
"The distance from %%0%% to %%1%% couldn\'t be calculated."
"Calculation not possible. Try again when you are back online."
"If you select another route, the personal segment settings will be lost."
"You need to be online to move to the claim. Try again when you are reconnected."
"Something went wrong when moving to the claim. Please try again later."
"Want to claim mileage expenses? You’ll need to enter your car details in your user profile in the web browser first. Once you’ve done that, you’ll be good to go with mileage."
"If you select automatic capturing, your journeys are automatically captured depending on the working hours you set that appear below."
"If you turn this off, you will not be notified when location tracking for a trip stops."
"If you turn this off, you will not be notified when location tracking for a trip starts."

"When Auto Tracking is on, Concur will automatically track and upload your motion and location, even when you are not using the app, within the hours set below. You can adjust these hours and decide whether to receive tracking notifications. Concur will use your location and motion for automatically capturing mileage expenses."
"Mileage capture started. Location tracking in progress."

"Concur Drive requires you to allow Concur to always access your location, even while you are not using the app. This requires you to set location services for Concur to \'Always\' under Privacy in your device settings. Note: if you do not have Push Notifications on for this app, you will not receive notices of when your location is being tracked."
"Your routes are uploaded and shared with Concur and may be accessed by your employer or other company through which you access Concur."
"All trips will now be tracked all the time until \'Stop\' is pushed."
"All trips will now be tracked all the time until the end of the upcoming or current period in the hours you set."
"Further trips will still be tracked all the time in accordance with the hours you set."
"Route will be saved. Further trips will still be tracked all the time in accordance with the hours you set."
"Mileage capturing is deactivated. Concur Drive is not tracking your location or movement."
"Control route capturing yourself. When \'Start\' is pushed, you track all trips all the time, until \'Stop\' is pushed."
"Control route capturing yourself. When \'Start Tracking\' is pushed, you track all trips all the time, until \'Stop Tracking\' is pushed."
"Your routes are automatically captured depending on the hours you set below."

"Your routes are automatically captured depending on the hours you set below. In addition, you can select your vehicle\'s Bluetooth so that capturing is limited to when you have a Bluetooth connection."

"When \'Add Directly To Expenses\' is on, your routes are automatically uploaded and shared with Concur and your employer or other company that provides you with access to Concur; when it is off, your routes are saved only on your device in the upload queue."
"Check the car details in your user profile in the web browser."
"The vehicle %1$@ entered for this expense no longer exists and has been replaced with %2$@"
"The vehicle %1$s entered for this expense no longer exists and has been replaced with %2$s"
"The commute route will be removed as it is not needed for %1$@."
"The commute route will be removed as it is not needed for %1$s."
"Please add a route to this expense"
"Wait until mileage expenses have finished uploading"
"We recommend you connect to your vehicle\'s Bluetooth so that routes are captured only while you are in range of your vehicle."
"Use Bluetooth and select a paired device. Connect to your vehicle\'s Bluetooth so that routes are captured only while you are in range of your vehicle during the scheduled hours you set."
"Select a paired device that should trigger tracking when connected during the scheduled hours you set."
"Select a device that should trigger tracking during the scheduled hours you set."
"Select a device if you want to use Bluetooth."
"Select a device below, or turn off \'Use Bluetooth\'."
"Connect to your vehicle Bluetooth then select a device below, or turn off \'Use Bluetooth\'."
"Bluetooth device missing. Select a device to continue capturing routes."
"Can\'t find the selected Bluetooth device. Check the Bluetooth device settings."
"To continue capturing routes, select a different paired device in Drive Settings, or turn off Bluetooth in Concur Drive to continue capturing without a paired device."
"To continue capturing routes, check your mileage settings, or turn off Bluetooth in Concur Drive to continue with scheduled mode only. Or you can disable auto capturing completely."
"To continue capturing routes, select a different paired device, or turn off Bluetooth in Concur Drive to continue with scheduled mode only. Or you can disable auto capturing completely."
"Capture routes only when you are connected to a paired Bluetooth device."
"When \'Use Motion\' is on, motion detectors on your device are used to improve accuracy of route capturing."
"Turning this on will allow the use of motion detectors on your device to improve accuracy of route capturing."
"Enable Motion & Fitness Tracking in Device Settings"
"Turning this on will allow the use of motion detection to better determine that mileage is tracked while your vehicle is moving. Concur does not store any of your motion data."
"The map and route could not be loaded."
"You can split the route into single segments, but this cannot be undone."
"Every single route driven will be saved as a separate mileage expense."
"Adjoining routes driven on the same day will be consolidated into one route and then stored in the upload queue."
"Use Bluetooth and select your vehicle Bluetooth while in range. When you are connected, routes are then captured during the scheduled hours you set."
"Go to your device settings, and turn on Bluetooth to allow Concur to capture your trips with a specific vehicle during your scheduled hours."
"Concur Drive uses your location so that your mileage can be automatically captured."

"Allow Concur to access your location, even when you are not using the app, so that your mileage can be automatically captured. Your routes are uploaded and shared with Concur and may be accessed by your employer or another company through which you access Concur."
"Allow Concur Drive to use your location for mileage capturing in Location Settings."
"Allow Concur Drive to use your location for mileage capturing in the app permissions."
"This security key is separate from your login credentials and will have to be entered whenever the Concur mobile app is started or after a period of inactivity."
"If you forget the security key, it cannot be recovered and will require the app to reset."
"For your security, Concur doesn’t keep a copy of your security key."
"Your company requires you to reset your security key."
"Cannot be the same as your user ID"
"Use at least %1$@ lowercase and %2$@ uppercase letter"
"Use at least %1$@ lowercase and %2$@ uppercase letters"
"Why the need for a security key?"

"To protect the data and privacy of both you and your company, the Concur mobile app requires an additional security key be set. This is a device-specific key used to encrypt the data stored by the Concur mobile app."
"This security key is separate from your login credentials and will have to be entered whenever the Concur mobile app is started or after a period of inactivity."
"If you forget the security key, it cannot be recovered and will require the app to reset."
"Strong passcodes are longer and combine upper and lower case letters, numbers and special characters."
"This will restore the Concur mobile app to its default settings."

"To protect the data and privacy of both you and your company, the Concur mobile app requires an additional security key be set. This is a device-specific key used to encrypt the data stored by the Concur mobile app."
"When you add a Request, you will see it here"
"You can add Requests using your Concur web account"
"Your changes may be lost if you proceed. Would you like to save these changes?"
"What hotel can I find for you?"
"Travel uses your location to provide you with hotels near you."
"For example, say: \"Find a hotel near the Statue of Liberty for next week.\""
"Could not search hotels, please try again."
"Could not show maps now, search in-progress."
"We could not find any hotels with the given search criteria. Please try again with different criteria."
"Reservations cannot be completed while your device is offline. Please reconnect to the internet and try again."
"Unable to perform request. Please check your internet connection."
"Are you sure you want to book this room?"
"Your travel policy does not allow booking this rate."

"Are you sure you want to reserve this room?\nI understand that my credit card will be charged immediately and no cancellation will be possible later in the booking process. All or portions of the deposit will be forfeited upon cancellation."
"The following booking fields have missing or invalid values. Please review and provide the appropriate values."
"An error has occurred retrieving booking information fields. Searches cannot be performed at this time."
"The service is unable to complete the operation at this time. Please try again later, or contact your company administrator if this continues."
"This operation is not supported in offline mode. Please try again when data connectivity is available."
"+%%0!number of points can be earned for this booking%% pts"
"+%%0!number of points can be earned for this booking%% points"
"%%0!number of points can be redeemed for this booking%% pts"
"Book under this price to help your company meet its travel savings goals."
"We couldn\'t find anything. Try again with a different search term."
"Haven\'t found your location? Try a more specific search."
"No results found. Search again or create a new address."
"There was an error processing your request. Please try again."
"Enter your work email to receive your sign-in information."
"A password must be at least 7 characters. It must contain numbers (0-9), uppercase and lowercase characters (A-Z, a-z) and symbols (such as ^%*@#). It cannot contain spaces."
"The mobile PIN is only used for the Concur Mobile app."
"Password can contain letters, numbers and special characters, but no spaces."
"Your entry does not appear to be a valid work email."
"Please make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again."
"Please wait until you are online to login."
"Use SSO if your company has issued an SSO company code."
"We are unable to sign you in with this information"
"Not a member yet? Try Test Drive"
"Test Drive is a great way to learn more about Concur and how it can help you manage your expense claims."
"By registering, you accept our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy"
"Cut expense claims from hours down to minutes."
"We have pre-loaded sample expense claims, card charges and receipts as well as guided overlays to help you on your way."
"NOTE: This is a demo account and should not be used for real expenses."
"Please enter a valid email in the Email Address field."
"To access your Concur account, select Sign In"
"The password is too short. Passwords must be at least 7 characters."
"If you continue to experience problems, please contact your Company Administrator."
"Your password has expired or is temporary. Please reset your password."
"If the email you provided us is valid, you should receive an email to reset your password and sign in."
"Fix to display flight segment class to request approvers"
"Concur for Mobile iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch Version 9.27 will require iOS 8.0 or higher"
"Display flight segment class to request approvers"
"IMPORTANT: We are deprecating iOS devices on OS lower than 8.0. Users will be able to continue using Concur Mobile 9.26. Concur for iOS version 9.27 will require iOS 8.0 or higher."
"The application requires permission to access your photos."
"The application requires permission to access your camera."
"We were unable to load the high-resolution image from the gallery. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again."
"Failed to delete this single allocation, please contact administrator."
"Failed to delete allocations, please contact administrator."
"This will remove all allocations for this expense."
"This expense has already been allocated. Since personal expenses cannot be allocated, all allocations for this expense will be deleted."
"If you itemise an expense after allocating, the allocations will be lost, Do you want to proceed?"
"Allocations are temporarily unavailable. Please try again later."
"The allocation for one or more allocation rows is zero. Press Yes to accept this allocation amount. Press No to edit the allocation amount."
"Service unavailable. Please log out and log in again later."
"Parent of itemised Expenses cannot be allocated"
"The specified expenseId does not allow allocations"
"The policy of the specified claim does not have an allocation form defined. Contact your Concur Administrator"

"1. This will initiate the creation of a missing receipt affidavit. The affidavit should be used when the merchant has not provided a receipt or a duplicate cannot be obtained. By initiating the affidavit, you are stating that the related expense is in compliance with company policy and qualifies as a legitimate business expense.\n\n2. If the original receipt is located or received, it should be attached to the claim at that time."

"I acknowledge that this expense is a legitimate corporate expense incurred by me on behalf of Concur Technology’s benefit and an allowable expense as defined in Concur’s Travel & Entertainment Policy. I certify that one or more of the related receipts applicable to this expense are no longer available."
"Are you sure that you want to detach the receipt image?"
"Some of the selected items cannot be deleted."
"Request has gone mobile. Now you can create requests for flights, hotels, rental cars or trains, right from your mobile device."
"Request has gone mobile. Now you can view your existing requests, right from your mobile device."
"No results found. Search again when you are back online."
"Limited results. Search again when you are back online."
"No results found. Try again when you are back online."
"Your expense has been queued for upload."
"Your company has disabled air booking on mobile. Please book your flight using the web version of Concur or by calling your Travel Agency."
"Before you can book air travel, you must complete your travel profile. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."
"Your travel profile has never been saved and must be saved at least one time prior to booking. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel, select Profile and Save."
"Your travel configuration billing code/type requires the existence of projects. Please contact your Company Administrator to set up the appropriate projects."
"Vinnet no longer exists! The client should not be receiving this profile check code."
"Your travel profile requires a value for mobile phone. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."
"Your travel profile requires a value for Passport Nationality. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."
"Your travel profile requires a value for Job Title. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."
"Your travel profile requires a value for Org Unit. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Name-Remark. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu.\nNOTE: This field may have a customised label. If not found, please contact your Company Administrator."
"Your travel profile requires a value for Manager. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."
"Your travel profile requires a value for Employee ID. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."
"Your travel profile requires a valid email address. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."
"Your travel profile requires a value for work address (street, city and country). Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."
"Your travel profile requires a value for either a work or home phone number. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."
"You did not fill in all required fields. Do you want to add the item anyway?"
"You did not fill in all required fields. Do you want to save anyway?"
"Add expenses to your claim. Then submit and get reimbursed. Managers can approve from anywhere."
"Take photos of your receipts. No more stacks of receipts piling up."
"Turn receipts into expenses, as you go."
"Book travel anytime, anywhere and view your reservations in one place."
"ExpenseIt requires phone camera with auto focus mode."
"Synchronised alerts for American Express® Card holders."
"Push notifications will remind you to take a photo of your receipt when you make a purchase."
"Choose from a list of hotels that you or your coworkers have previously stayed at. *Limited availability."
"You can now enter the hotel name under the filter button."
"Take a photo of a receipt and ExpenseIt will turn it into an expense for you."
"ExpenseIt is experiencing processing delays. We appreciate your patience while we resolve the issue."
"Scheduled maintenance work in progress. Please try again later."
"We\'ll be back with your analysed receipt information shortly."
"We were unable to read this receipt. Please retake the image and submit again."
"Stop receipt analysis and create an expense manually?"
"Your receipt analysis has finished and can be found in the list of expenses."
"An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later."
"Your receipt(s) are ready to be reviewed."
"Receipt could not be analysed. Please retake or resubmit photo."
"We were unable to read this receipt. Please retake the image and submit again."
"This image contains multiple receipts. Please submit only one receipt per image."
"Something went wrong. Please retake the image and submit again."
"Unable to upload image at this time; please try again later."
"Concur Mobile requires you to log in again so you are ready to use ExpenseIt functionality."
"The image was sent to ExpenseIt and it will be uploaded asap."
"Be aware: If you log out unsynchronised data will be lost."
"ExpenseIt is no longer available for your account. Please contact your company administrator for more details. Thank you."
"Go online to see full list of help topics."
"Allow Concur to access your location while you use this app?"
"Concur uses your location to aid expense creation and other expense and travel services."
"Location is disabled by iOS. Enable it on device settings"
"Location data will be sent with the receipts"
"Processing is taking too long. Please try again later or contact support."
"An error occurred with your account. Please contact support to verify your provisioning."
"An error occurred with your session. Please log out and try again in a few hours"
"Expense is now automatically saved. No save action is needed from you."
"Your request has been successfully submitted. A member of our support staff will respond as soon as possible."
"To save images taken with ExpenseIt, please allow access to your photo gallery. You can update your preferences in settings."
"The camera is not able to capture top quality photos with a minimal resolution of %1.2fMP. The app can still be used without e-Bunsho compliancy."
"Your image resolution is less than the minimum resolution requirement of %1.2fMP."
"Your image resolution is less than the minimum resolution requirement of 4 MP."
"Would you like to upload this receipt now?"
"I agree and consent to disclose my location data to Concur to aid the expense location recognition process"
"Expense is now automatically saved. No save action is needed from you."
"Multi-select your expenses and move them into a claim, or delete them from your expense list."
"Please contact your administrator for additional information."
"Are you sure you want to cancel this train reservation?"
"Really cancel train reservation in %%0!city%% from %%1!begin date%% to %%2!end date%%?"
"An error has occurred retrieving the station list. Train searches cannot be performed at this time."
"Could not save receipt at this time. Please try again later."
"Are you sure you want to approve this invoice?"
"Are you sure you want to approve these invoices?"

"We recently redesigned the Message Centre. Depending on your subscribed services and region, you may receive new messages soon. No need to check this section regularly, as we will notify you when there is a new message. On the other hand, you can review messages here that you previously received."
"Where would you like to save the receipt?"
"We\'ll be back with your analysed receipt information shortly."
"We are sorry, but we need your input to continue."
"You can add requests using your Web Concur account"
"Find hotels whose names contain this text"
"Unable to upload image at this time; please try again later."
"It is not permitted to add failed ExpenseIt items to a claim."
"Note: This is a demo account and should not be used for real expenses."
"Your session expired but you have been automatically logged in again."
"Your session has expired. Please sign in again."
"%%0!minimum value of price to beat%% - %%1!maximum value of price to beat%%"
"You will lose any changes you made to the expense, including any receipts you attached."
"You will lose any changes you made to the expense, but your receipt will be saved in the receipt store."
"A system error occurred. Please try again or contact your administrator."
"No flights found. Please adjust your search criteria."
"Before reserving this flight in violation of company policy, you must provide a reason in the field shown in red."
"An error has occurred retrieving sell information fields. Reservation cannot be done at this time. Please try later."
"Before reserving this room in violation of company policy, you must provide a reason in the field shown in red."

"In most cases, you will sign into our app using the same username and password you use for the web version of Concur. If you don\'t have this information, please submit your email on the previous screen to receive sign-in info or contact your company administrator."
"If you are not able to receive your work email on this device, you will need to change your password using the web Concur web at concursolutions.com."
"If you use the same email address for more than one Concur profile, you might not receive the password reset email."
"You can view or modify your work email in the Email Addresses section of your Profile Settings of the Concur web app at concursolutions.com."
"More information and training can be found at concurtraining.com/pr/mobile."
"No rates defined for the date provided."
"Looks like we hit a snag. Please try again."
"Fields in red need to be filled to complete booking!"
"The departure and arrival airports are the same. Please select different airports for your trip."
"Bookings cannot be made while your device is offline. Please reconnect to the internet and try again."
"You will not be able to complete a booking for Southwest Airlines in New Air at this time."
"Concur needs \"Location\" permission to show you relevant maps and directions."
"Please enable location permission for this feature"
"Please enable camera and storage permission for this feature"
"Concur needs \"Camera\" and \"Storage\" permission to show you relevant maps and directions."
"Please enable storage permission for this feature"
"Concur needs \"Storage\" permission to attach a receipt."
"Please enable contact permission for this feature"
"Concur needs \"contact\" permission to add a new attendee from your contacts."
"Allow Concur to access this device’s location."
"Concur needs \"Location\" permission to access current location."
"Could not retrieve Office Locations. Please log in again and try."
"The following field has an invalid value and must be corrected before saving."
"The following fields have invalid values and must be corrected before saving."
"Select the language to use when performing Voice Search"
"You have no unused card charges from %@"
"Your PIN must be at least %@ characters"
"Please enter a valid Login ID. %@ It should consist of your login name followed by an \'at\' sign and your company domain."
"Pick a claim from the list below to move your expenses to. Or move to a new claim by tapping the \'+\' button above."
"Move selected expense(s) to claim? You can attach receipts and edit expenses after moving them to a claim."
"Please connect to the internet and try again."
"We will use your calendar to access your meetings so you can more easily add attendees to expenses."
"We will use your camera to take pictures of receipts for your expenses."
"We will use your contacts to help add attendees to your expenses."
"We may use your location to assist with finding hotels near you and to send risk messaging notices."
"We will use your microphone when you use voice search."
"We allow you to select and upload photos of receipts for your expenses. Concur will only upload the photos you choose."
"We may use your location/motion to assist with finding hotels near you and auto capture mileage expenses."
"We will use motion detection to better determine that mileage is tracked while your vehicle is moving. Concur does not store any of your motion data."
"We will use Face ID to sign in to the application."
"We will use Bluetooth to capture your trips only with a specific vehicle during your scheduled hours, if Bluetooth in Drive settings is turned on, and your device is connected to your vehicle."

"We may use your location/motion to assist with finding hotels near you and auto capture mileage expenses. Note: if you do not have Push Notifications on for this app, you will not receive notices of when your location is being tracked."
"We will use your location and motion for automatically capturing mileage expenses."
"Note: if you do not have Push Notifications on for this app, you will not receive notices of when your location is being tracked."
"You may choose to send your location with your check in details. Would you like to also send your current location?"
"Your location details will not be sent with your response.\nIf you change your mind, use [Enable Location]"

"You are about to confirm that you are OK. This is in response to a request from your company as you have been identified in a high-risk situation. If this is correct, please use the [Send] button to confirm your status."
"Help request and location details sent successfully."
"Error while sending your help request. Try again."
"Error while sending your check-in details. Try again."
"Location details will be sent as part of your check-in"
"Location details will be sent along with your expense creation and other expense and travel services."
"Concur does not access your location details while you use this app and they will not be sent."
"Location access is disabled for Concur on your device. Allow Concur to access your location in the Settings app."
"Your device could not send email. Please check email configuration and try again."
"There has been an error while performing the operation. Please try again later."
"You are offline. Turn on data access to improve your location accuracy and send your status."
"There has been an error performing the operation. Please try again later."
"Allow Concur to access your location while you use this app. Concur uses your location to aid expense creation and other expense and travel services."
"Location Services are currently disabled on your phone. To allow us to provide you with a better safety service turn them on in the system settings."
"In case of emergency, please call %1$@ for assistance or contact your company at %2$@"
"In case of emergency please call %@ for assistance"
"In case of emergency contact your company at %@"
"In case of emergency follow orders of the government. For non-urgent assistance contact your company below by phone."
"Allow Concur to access your location while you use this app. We may use your location to ensure your safety while travelling."
"Concur provides your location so you may be contacted by your company in an event of an emergency."
"Location access is disabled for Concur on your device. Allow Concur to access location in the Settings app."
"Concur may use your location to aid expense creation and other expense and travel services."
"In your device settings for Concur, tap location, then allow location access. Set Allow Location Access to \"Always\"."
"Concur provides your location so you may be contacted by your company in an event of an emergency."
"Your manager will be notified of this fare."
"Please note that the most restrictive set of rules below applies to your entire itinerary."
"Please review the rules and restrictions listed below."
"By completing this booking, I agree that I have read and accept the following:"
"Fare Rules and Restrictions cannot be retrieved at this time."
"Hazardous Goods Policy cannot be retrieved at this time."
"Hazardous Goods Policy does not apply to your flight selection."
"No rules apply to this section of the flight."
"Are you sure you want to book this flight?"
"Booking sent for approval. Please review your itinerary at a later date"
"Connection was disrupted after sending your booking details. Please come back to check your itinerary details for flight confirmation."
"Sorry we are unable to complete your booking. Please adjust your search and try again."
"Sorry we are unable to complete your booking at this time. Please try again later."
"This request cannot be completed as a duplicate booking is detected for this trip. Please check your itinerary."
"Fields in red required before you book your flight."
"There must have been a typo. Please re-enter the Mobile PIN so it matches exactly in both fields."
"The Mobile PIN reset was requested from another device. Please use the same device you requested the Mobile PIN reset."
"The password reset was requested from another device. Please use the same device you requested the password reset."
"You must use a minimum of %1$@ characters."
"We could not load the most recent invoice data. Please pull to refresh to try again."
"We could not load the most recent invoice data. Please tap here to refresh to try again."
"We could not load the most recent approval data. To try again, please pull to refresh."
"Your travel profile is incomplete. Please update your profile details on the web version of Concur Travel in order to complete an air booking."
"Once updated you will need to logout and login again to the app."
"Your company has disabled air booking on mobile. Please book your flight using the web version of Concur or by calling your travel agency."
"A missing receipt affidavit cannot be filed with %1$@"
"Your changes may be lost if you proceed. Would you like to save these changes?"
"Once an affidavit has been filed, changes made will generate a new affidavit."
"We could not load content data. Please pull to refresh to try again"
"Everything is in the claim, combined and ready to go. Just review your expense and submit for approval."
"Expense items are moving to your unsubmitted claim."

"Currently only flights WITHOUT a yellow or red triangle can be booked on mobile. The flight you selected is out of policy and must be booked on the web if you choose to continue with this selection. We’ll be adding that functionality soon."
"Please adjust dates of travel to be within 11 months of today\'s date."
"Sorry, we couldn’t retrieve the updated taxes and fees at this time. Please try again later"
"ExpenseIt requires phone camera with auto focus mode."
"To protect the data and privacy of both you and your company, the Concur mobile app requires that a passcode be set on this device."
"To protect the data and privacy of both you and your company, the Concur mobile app requires that a screen lock be set on this device."
"The Concur mobile app does not support rooted devices. Please restore this device to factory settings."
"The Concur mobile app does not support jailbroken devices. Please restore this device to factory settings."
"There must have been a typo. Please re-enter the Mobile PIN so it matches exactly in both fields."
"A password must be at least 7 characters. It can contain numbers (0–9), uppercase and lowercase characters (A–Z, a–z) and symbols (such as ^%*@#). It cannot contain spaces."
"The Mobile PIN reset was requested from another device. Please use the same device from which you requested the Mobile PIN reset."
"Your Mobile PIN must be at least %%0!length%% characters."
"This item contains e-Bunsho timestamped receipt and cannot be deleted."
"%1$d out of %2$d items deleted. Only non e-Bunsho items can be deleted."
"This expense contains e-Bunsho timestamped receipts and cannot be deleted."
"Allow Concur to access your location while you use this app. Concur uses your location to aid expense creation and other expense and travel services.\n%1$s"
"In case of emergency, please call %1$s for assistance or contact your company via email: %2$s"
"Help request and location details sent successfully."
"We could not load the most recent claim data. Please try again."
"Check the Concur website for additional claims"
"Are you sure you want to delete this expense claim?"
"This operation is not supported in offline mode. Please try again when network connectivity is available."
"Sorry, we couldn’t complete your request. Please try again in a moment."
"Please fill in all required fields and fix any errors on the form before saving the claim."
"Your changes may be lost, would you like to continue?"
"Your changes may be lost, would you like to continue?"
"Are you sure that you want to remove this expense? Any attached receipts will be moved to your available expenses."
"Are you sure you want to delete this expense?"
"Text length should be less than %1$@ characters"
"Changing %1$@ will overwrite all custom fields in this claim. These fields may need to be re-entered."
"Would you like to overwrite all fields, or save the new value to this claim only?"
"Your device is currently offline. This operation is not supported in offline mode."
"We could not load the most recent claim data. Please pull to refresh."
"We could not load the most recent claim data. Please tap to refresh."
"Welcome to the Concur app! Get started by exploring the features that will help you save time."
"Let Expense Assistant start your expense claim. All you\'ll need to do is review and submit."
"Concur Locate provides a powerful employee risk management and safety communication solution that allows you to make sure employees are safe, no matter where they are."
"Save time by automating your distance capture"
"Concur Drive on Concur mobile saves you time by automatically capturing your route while you drive, helping you seamlessly expense your mileage."
"Bluetooth makes your mileage capturing more accurate."
"Connect to your vehicle, and routes will only be captured while you are in range during your scheduled hours."
"ExpenseIt turns receipts into expenses for you. This makes expensing easier and getting reimbursed quicker."
"Search and book travel-anytime, anywhere. When booking with Concur, you can stay in policy without having to think about policy at all."
"Stop digging through your email to find your confirmation number. Trip details for your travel booked with Concur can be found in the app."
"ExpenseIt is now available in the Concur mobile app."
"Take photos of your receipts on the go and ExpenseIt will use the images to create expenses for you."
"Using just your itinerary, your daily allowances can be automatically calculated and added to your expense claim."
"Don\'t wait until you\'re at the computer to review claims. Approve them from your phone whenever you like."
"Receipt is not allowed to be moved to claim. Only expenses can be moved to claim."
"%1$d out of %2$d items moved. Only expenses can be moved to claim."

resources.string: "We are unable to sign you in at this time. Please contact your company\'s help desk or travel/expense department."
"Really cancel car reservation in %%0!city%% from %%1!pickup date%% to %%2!dropoff date%%?"
"Due to being offline, expense type and/or currency selection data is not available at this time."
"Would you like to try again or get sign in help?"
"Searching for flights from %%0%% to %%1%% on %%2%% and returning on %%3%%."
"This is a card authorisation. Please wait for the card charge before submitting."
"No receipt has been found on the server. If you have already attached a receipt to the claim, please come back later and check again."
"For example, say: \"Find an economy car in San Antonio for Thanksgiving weekend.\""
"Your configuration does not support receipts. Please check with your administrator."
"(Long press on expense for more options.)"
"Current location could not be determined. Please select the desired location."
"This expense already has a receipt associated with it. Please select \'Append\' to append this new receipt to this expense or \'Replace\' to replace the existing receipt with this new receipt."

"Your PIN is an alternative way to log in and can be created in cases where you are automatically logged into the Web version of Concur by your company and you don\'t know the password. To create a PIN, visit the Web version of Concur (Profile > Mobile Registration)."
"You are offline. Please wait until you are online to submit the claim."
"No vehicles were found. A vehicle must be configured online before a mileage expense can be created."
"Your company booking policy is not currently supported. Custom fields support is coming soon. Please book travel using the web version of Concur."
"The current itinerary is no longer available."
"You have cancelled the retrieval of the updated distance to date. A mileage expense cannot be created."
"Get approved for air, hotel and more"
"Configuring your mobile session using single sign-on has failed. Please contact your company administrator."
"Failed (non-expense user or no receipt store access will be removed)"
"You have missing required fields on the form. Do you want to continue saving?"
"Concur Mobile can send notifications to your device when items such as approvals or card charges are ready for you. Do you want to allow these notifications?"
"For example, say: \"Find a first class flight from Seattle to Miami on July 4th.\""
"Your entry does not appear to be a valid email or Concur username."
"Some of the attendees cannot be added because their attendee types are excluded from this expense type."
"Try again to re-enter your credentials or select I Forgot to receive sign-in instructions."
"Your account is not configured for submitting claims."
"A receipt is shown as attached to this expense on the server, but the receipt no longer exists in the receipt manager."
"What flight can I find for you?"
"An error occurred while approving the trip. Please try again."
"No receipts uploaded. Choose the \'+\' button below to upload a receipt now and use it later from your claim or expense entries."
"Selecting options that cost less than the price-to-beat earns you travel points that can be used toward future benefits."
"Cut expense claims from hours down to minutes."
"Swipe right to view advanced search fields."

"According to company policy, you must provide receipts for the expenses listed below. You may either fax the receipts or attach scanned images. If you have already provided receipts, you can submit your claim now."
"This device will not receive updates after this release because it is running an older version of Android."
"Searching for rental cars near %%0%% from %%1%% to %%2%%."
"Your account data has been wiped from this device. Please contact your company administrator for assistance."
"You have no unused corporate card charges"
"Unauthorised access violation. Please check your user name and/or PIN."
"You must be online before you can upload your item."
"We are unable to sign you in with this information."
"Your selected receipts will be shared to Concur\'s Receipt Store in the background. Please check the notification area on your phone\'s screen for updates."
"No matching hotel rates could be found. Please modify your search criteria and try again."
"Are you sure you want to approve this claim?"
"If your agency has issued an agency code, enter it below."
"Before reserving this room in violation of company policy, you must provide a justification in the field shown in red."
"The receipt document is of type PDF. Please install a PDF viewer on your Android device in order to view this receipt document."
"At least one required field in this claim lacks data. A red exception flag marks the expense and a list identifies the field(s) to be filled."
"Due to being offline, expense type selection data is not available at this time. Please log in again when connected to retrieve the necessary data."
"The retrieval of car rates has failed. A mileage expense cannot be created."
"Booking a flight that costs less than the price-to-beat saves your company money."
"Your company has disabled Concur for mobile. Please contact your administrator."
"The selected credit card will be charged and the ticket will be issued immediately. The reservation may not be eligible for changes or refunds. Are you sure you want to reserve this flight?"
"Company code (SSO) login required. Enter the company code on the next screen to proceed."
"The entry must be saved before proceeding. Would you like to proceed?"
"At least one of the selected expenses is missing a receipt."
"You will be redirected to the Taxi Magic app"
"Try again to re-enter your password or select I Forgot to receive sign-in instructions."
"Your company has disabled this feature for mobile."
"Failed to parse the claim form fields. Please try again."
"Your receipt has been queued for upload."
"Your company booking policy is not currently supported. Support for it is coming soon. Please book travel using the web version of Concur."
"(Long press on attendee for more options.)"
"Your agent might ask for the Trip Record Locator: %%0!trip record locator%%"
"Before reserving this flight in violation of company policy, you must provide a justification in the field shown in red."

"This claim can be submitted, but contains at least one expense entry missing a required receipt. Attach a receipt using Concur web or via mobile, remove the expense from the claim, attach the receipt and add it back to the claim."
"Your travel profile requires a value for Middle Name, Gender and Date of Birth. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu."
"The retrieval of an updated distance to date has failed. A mileage expense cannot be created."
"Your company has disabled Concur for mobile. Please contact your administrator."
"Please enter a valid value for this field."
"Please visit the web to provision one or more credit cards for %%0%% use."
"Thank you for using Concur! Would you mind taking a moment to rate our application on Google Play?"
"Swipe left to view advanced search results."
"If your email address is in our system, you\'ll receive an email. Open it from this device to access the Concur app."
"Rooms at this property are not available for specific dates. Please select a different hotel."
"The password reset was requested from another device. Please use the same device from which you requested the password reset."
"Your company requires single sign-on (SSO) via a company sign-in page. Please select the \'Having Trouble Signing In?\' link at the bottom of this page."
"Please contact your company\'s help desk or travel/expense department."
"Contact import failed. Please ensure a contact is selected that contains first name, last name, title or company information."
"The following fields have missing values and must be filled in prior to saving. Please provide the necessary values and then save."
"Please provide a value for company code."

"Your travel profile requires a value for either a work or home phone number. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for work address (street, city and country). Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a valid email address. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile on the menu. Please log out, then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Employee ID. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."

"Before you can book air travel, you must complete your travel profile. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Middle Name, Gender and Date of Birth. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."
"You can create or reset your mobile PIN by clicking \'Need to set your PIN?\' or by navigating to \'Profile -> Mobile Registration\' in Concur online."
"The form for entering mileage was not found. Please try again later or contact your company administrator if this continues."
"Please enter a valid email in the Email Address field, before clicking Reset your password link."
"You have successfully checked in with your current location."
"Cannot find your current location. Please try later."
"Did you have a good experience with %s?"
"- Add another item to this request"
"We are fetching information for claim submission. Please wait and try again."
"The following fields have missing values and should be filled in. Skip providing values at this time and proceed?"
"Before reserving this room, you must read the cancellation policy details."

"Before you can book air travel, you must complete your travel profile. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for mobile phone. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel configuration billing code/type requires the existence of projects. Please contact your company administrator to set up the appropriate projects. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile has never been saved and must be saved at least once prior to booking. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel, select Profile and save. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."
"Your session has expired and auto-sign-in is disabled. You must sign in again."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Org Unit. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Name-Remark. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. NOTE: This field may have a customised label. If not found, please contact your company administrator. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Passport Nationality. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."
"The set of custom booking violation reason codes failed to download at this time."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Job Title. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."

"Your travel profile requires a value for Manager. Please log in to the web version of Concur Travel and select Profile in the menu. Please log out and then log back in after providing the above information."
"With a total of %d segments for the trip"
"Attendee search has failed at this time. Please try again later."
"Let\'s get started. We have pre-loaded sample expense claims, card charges and receipts as well as guided overlays to help you on your way."
"Unable to append your receipt. Please try again later."
"makes it easy to plan your business trips, capture expenses and get reimbursed."
"Before reserving this flight in violation of company policy, you must provide a reason and justification in the fields shown in red."

"The expense claim contains one or more expenses with an expense type of Undefined. Select the expense type using Concur web or via mobile, remove the expense from the claim, select the expense type and add it back to the claim."
"Failed to add your credit card. Please try later."
"Could not save receipt at this time. Please try again later."
"Please contact your company administrator to configure violation reasons for %%0%% use."
"Search returned no matching attendees. Please try again."
"The creation of itemised entries has failed. Please try again later or contact your company administrator if this continues."
"Please enter a justification for booking this room."
"%%0!number of colleagues%% of your colleagues\' favourite"
"Book travel on the go with Concur"
"Your Test Drive account has expired. If you would like to learn more about Concur, please contact us at"
"Please fill in all required fields and fix any error on the form before saving the entry."
"Please try again. If you continue to experience problems accessing the system, please contact your company\'s help desk or travel/expense department."
"Would you like to rate us in the Google Play Store?"
"Removal of this expense is not supported on mobile."
"The expense claim has no expenses. You must create at least one expense in order to submit the claim."
"An error occurred during your save operation. Please visit the website for more information."
"The Concur service is not available at this time to handle this request. Please try again later."
"If any changes have been made by your agent, your itinerary may take a few minutes to update."
"Your travel agent has not provided a phone number."
"Your changes may be lost if you proceed. Would you like to save these changes?"
"Are you sure you want to submit this expense claim?"
"Failed to check in with your current location. Please try again."
"Please select an option from the list."
"Are you sure you want to reserve this flight?"
"Configuring your mobile session via single sign-on has failed. Please contact your company administrator."
"Removal of card charges is not supported on mobile"
"You have one or more frequent flyer accounts but did not select one for this booking. Select \'Proceed\' to continue with no account or \'Cancel\' to select an account."
"Uploading of the expense receipt picture has failed at this time. Please try again later or contact your company administrator if this continues."
"Set a PIN by using your Concur web account credentials."
"No attendee type available for this expense."
"Please enter required fields marked with an asterisk (*)."
"Failed to retrieve conditional fields values. Please try again."
"If your plans change, cancel and rebook another hotel on-the-go"
"You may attach scanned images to individual expenses or to the claim but original paper receipts must also be submitted. If you have already provided receipts, you can submit your claim now."
"Please enter a value greater than %d characters."
"Open the email from this device to access the Concur app."
"No matching hotels were found. Please modify your search criteria and try again."
"Check in with your current location for assistance"
"This is the email you set up in Profile/Personal Information/Email Addresses on the Concur website."
"No rates were defined for the date you selected. Please contact your administrator."

"If you don\'t know your credentials, log into your Concur web account and navigate to Profile > Mobile Registration or to My Account > Mobile PIN. Contact your company administrator for additional help."
"An error occurred during your request submission. Please visit the website for more information."
"Please fill in all required fields and fix any errors on the form before saving."
"The PIN reset was requested from another device. Please use the same device for which you requested the PIN reset."
"An error has occurred retrieving the itemisation list. Itemisation cannot be performed at this time."
"Please fill in all required fields and fix any errors on the form before saving the claim."
"Enter a PIN consisting of at least 4 characters using letters or numbers. Your company may require additional characters."
"No rates were defined. Please verify that the Transaction Date and Vehicle ID are properly configured with car rates."
"No cars have been found matching the selection criteria. Please choose different criteria and try again."
"Combine room rate and taxes into one entry"
"Please wait for your Amex pending transactions to post before submitting."
"The expense claims receipt is unavailable at this time. Please try again later."
"You have cancelled the retrieval of car rates. A mileage expense cannot be created."
"Are you sure you want to reserve this room?"
"Error occurred rejecting trip, please try again."
"Are you sure you want to delete this receipt?"
"Your card ending in %@ has been added to your SmartExpense account."
"There must have been a typo. Please re-enter the password so it matches exactly in both fields."
"Are you sure you want to reserve this car?"
"Offline sign-in is not available. A successful sign-in must occur while online before offline mode can be used."
"For help, log in to the web version of Concur and navigate to Profile > Mobile Registration."
"Are you sure you want to reserve this train?"
"Failed to retrieve login form for your credit card. Please try later."

"Earn travel points when you select options that cost less than the price-to-beat. When the trip is expensed, the travel points earned are reflected in the total that you can use towards future benefits."
"© Copyright 2013 Concur Technologies Inc. All rights reserved."
"Selecting most recently used list item is not supported for this field. Please use CTE web instead."
"Be a smarter travel buyer. Booking under the price-to-beat saves your company money."
"We had a problem reading the receipt. Create a manual expense using the receipt."
"Upload your receipts to the Receipt Store. Then open a claim or expense entry and attach the receipt."

"Attendee search fields failed to download at this time."

"An error has occurred updating booking information fields. Searches cannot be performed at this time."

"Agency Record Locator: %%0!trip record locator which can be asked by travel agent when called%%"

"Your user name should consist of your sign-in name followed by an \'at\' sign and your company domain."
"Search and book flights, hotels, car and more"

"Please provide feedback on issues you are seeing or any suggestions you may have."

"Please try again and use link within 24 hours of receipt."

"Booking a room that costs less than the price-to-beat saves your company money."

"Before reserving this room in violation of company policy, you must provide a reason and justification in the fields shown in red."

"%%0!number of colleagues%% of your colleagues stayed here"

"Please touch here to log into Concur Mobile."
"No need to save all that paper."

"(Long press receipt list items for more options.)"

"Booking under the price-to-beat saves your company money."

"Booking a flight that costs less than the price-to-beat earns you travel points that you can use later."

"Depending upon your company configuration, some of the Concur for Mobile features may not be available to you."

"Are you sure you want to approve this trip?"
"Editing for this connected list field is not currently supported on mobile. Please use CTE web instead."
